name: Spirited Pursuit
description:
A ghoulish race of risk and guile. You, The Ghost of 'Akaky Akakievich' stalks ‘The Important Person’ through the streets of St. Petersburg. Can you catch him before he gets home? And steal the fine coat from his back? Inspired by Nikolai Gogol's short story, 'The Overcoat’. 

As yet, best experienced on a desktop browser, my optimization skills for android etc. are yet to be...optimized.
